Translation.String: Customize your vehicles (supports Cities Skylines Sunset Harbor 1.13.3-f9).

Select the Language to be used for this mod. (default: Use Game Language)
Requires restart of the game.
Define a hotkey for the AVO user interface.
Enable Autosaving for Vehicle Configuration Data
If enabled, all changes on vehicles will be saved, , once data entry is finalized. (default: enabled)
If enabled, mod debug messages will be logged. (default: enabled)
Hide the UI button from the main toolbar. The AVO user interface can be accessed with the Hotkey anytime. (default: disabled - show UI button)
Enable warning for no available services at map loading
A warning is shown when game is started and city services do not have vehicles assigned. (default: enabled)
Display Miles per Hour (mph) instead of Kilometer per Hour (km/h)
Changes display of unit of speed from mph to km/h. (default: disabled - use km/h)
Enable various values for non-cargo and non-passenger vehicles

Allows changes the Firefighting Rate and Capacity for Fire Safety, the Crime Rate Capacity for Police Vehicles, the Maintenance and Pumping Rate for Maintenance Vehicles. (default: disabled)
Can de-balance the intended gameplay. Values are not documented.

If enabled, settings which can be modified in Improved Public Transport (by BloodyPenguin) and Transport Lines Manager (by Klyte) will be shown with red warning color. Values should be edited in these mods only.
If disabled, the coloring will not shown. (default: enabled)
Vehicle/Asset Color Expander: Priority over AVO vehicle coloring

Permanent setting, if Vehicle Color Expander (by Klyte) is active. The color management is controlled by Vehicle Color Expander.
Values will be configured in Vehicle/Asset Color Expander. (default: permanent enabled)
No Big Trucks: Classify Generic Industry vehicles as Large Vehicle
If enabled, Delivery Trucks can be tagged as Large Vehicles. Dispatch will be blocked by No Big Trucks (by MacSergey). (default: enabled)
Vehicle Trailer compatibility references last updated:
This field shows the vehicle list revision date for the Bus, Trolley Bus, Fire and Police trailers, which are in real life industry trailers, but have been re-categorized by AVO.
Open the Advanced Vehicle Options Wiki

Your configuration has been exported.
The configuration file can be found here:
The following services may not work correctly because no vehicles are enabled to spawn:
Select a category to display Tipp: Use the mouse wheel to switch between categories faster.
Type the name of a vehicle type
Autosave of Vehicle Config Data is enabled. All changes will be saved immediately to external configuration file.
Click here to cycle through the existing vehicles of that type. Hold Shift Key down for zooming directly to vehicle.
Click here to remove the selected vehicle.

Customized settings for all vehicles will be reset.
Proceed with Configuration reset ?
All vehicle configuration and customized settings have been reset to the Game Defaults.
Warning: Improved Public Transport is active and may override this setting.
Warning: Transport Lines Manager is active and may override this setting.
Change the maximum speed of the vehicle Please note, that vehicles do not go beyond speed limits of the network they are used.
Change the vehicle acceleration factor; Defines how fast the car accelerates.
Change the vehicle braking factor#xA;Defines how quick the car breaks.
Change the vehicle turning factor#xA;Defines how well the car corners
Change the vehicle spring factor Defines how much the suspension moves.
Change the vehicle damper factor Defines how quickly the suspension returns to the default state.
Change the vehicle lean multiplication factor Defines how much the vehicle leans to the sides when turning.
Change the vehicle nod multiplication factor Defines how much the vehicle nods forward/backward when braking or accelerating.
Enable color variations A random color is chosen between the four following colors.
Colors are managed by Vehicle/Asset Color Expander
Make sure you have at least one vehicle allowed to spawn for that category.
Make the last car of this train be an engine.

Prevent vehicles with trailer to deliver to small buildings.
This is controlled by the No Big Trucks mod.
Change the capacity of the vehicle.
Change special parameters of the vehicle.

If you do not know, what this value is: Do not touch it!
Click for User Guide: Special Capacity.
Manage Spawning in Transport Line Overview
Open the Transport Line Overview and manage the vehicle spawning.
Click for User Guide: Spawn Control
Bus trailers spawning is controlled by the main Bus vehicle. Settings must be configured from the Transport Line Overview panel.
Remove all driving vehicles of that type. Hold the SHIFT key to remove all types.
Remove all parked vehicles of that type. Hold the SHIFT key to remove all types.
may not work correctly because no vehicles are allowed to spawn.
